meanings.definition: Used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked them to sit down.
meanings.sent3: They were so excited to see them at the party!
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky looked like them, twinkling brightly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of them laughing echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to people in general.
meanings.sent1: One should always be kind to them.
meanings.sent2: It is important to treat them with respect.
meanings.sent3: Them always seem to know the best places to eat.
meanings.sent4: The power of kindness can truly change them for the better.
meanings.sent5: In the end, it is our actions towards them that define us.
